title: As BOC, I want to give players a day of service when he has a service accruing roster status
custom_steps: WHEN the user views a breakdown of a players MJ service
custom_expected:
THEN  the "Current Season Service" days is the number of days he has gotten service in the current season including today
AND the player accrues a day of service for each day he has one of the following roster statuses:

- 15D – 15 Day DL
- ACT – Active

title: As BOC, I want to see a player's total MLS
custom_steps: WHEN the user runs the MJ Service Batch
custom_expected:
THEN Using the "Current Season Service" value, update the player's Total MLS on the service tab on his player profile and the player header.
AND To get the total MLS, add the Current season MLS to Prior season MLS.
AND Major League Service is displayed as "XX.YYY"; "X" is the full season year while "YYY" is the number of days in the current season. A player earns a full season by accruing 172 days of Major League Service.  For example, "1.105" means that a player have  one full year (172 days) plus 105 days of Major League Service.
AND XX will increment once YYY reaches 171.  For example, if a player is at 1.171, the next value would be 2.000.

title: I want to see MLS in the profile header for players who have not played in at least two seasons
custom_steps: WHEN opening a player profile for a player who has played less than two MLB Seasons
custom_expected: THEN the MLS in the profile header is correct

title: As BOC, I can see a day by day breakdown of player's MJ service
custom_steps: WHEN user runs the MJ Services Batch
custom_expected:
THEN For all players affected by the MJ service batch, on the Service tab of the player profile, add the section "Breakdown" as per wireframe: http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=service
AND The year dropdown is set to current year. We will only start keeping breakdown history from the year Ebis 2.5 goes live
AND Do now show "Type of Service" filter dropdown as this will not be implemented before go-live
AND Table is not editable

AND Show table with following columns (other columns implemented later and should not be added to page)
- Date - Show a row for every date starting from Opening day to Last day of season. Most recent on top
- MJ Roster Status EOD - MJ Roster status for the player at the end of each of those days
- Org EOD - Org of player at end of each date
- MJ service - Check mark if player got service that day.  Blank otherwise
- MJ Day - Start count of service day so 1st day of service would be 1, 2nd day is 2 etc.

title: CBA: As BOC, I do not want players to receive Service when suspended for Drug use
custom_steps: WHEN a player is on the Restricted List with Reason "Violation of Major League Drug Testing Program"
custom_expected:
THEN they should no longer get a day of service (per the new CBA)

Note:
- See #120768087 where this exception was originally implemented. This exception should now no longer apply

title: As BOC, I want to see a yearly summary of MJ Service on the player's profile from ebis 1
custom_steps: WHEN user views a player's service tab on their profile
custom_expected:
THEN the Major League Summary section appears as a collapsible section to the page. It should be expanded by default. http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=service
AND Bring over all Service history from ebis 1 and display in this section.
AND When player has played for multiple Orgs in the same year, each Org has it's own row for that year.
AND Note that in ebis 1, Adjustments was split up into Option days, strike days and Misc days. In Ebis 2, this is combined into one adjustments field which is the sum of the 3 values in ebis 1
AND any comments entered in ebis 1 should show in bubble format in ebis 2

title: As Club/BOC, I do not want to see MJ service section for players who have never played in the MJ leagues
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as club or BOC
custom_steps: WHEN viewing a player's stats tab
custom_expected:
THEN if player has never played in the Major leagues, hide the following sections on the Service tab
Service Info
- Major League Service 
- Milestones section

title: As BOC, I want the current year MJ service summary to get updated daily
custom_steps: WHEN the MJ Service Batch is run
custom_expected:
THEN Populate the Major League summary table with the most current information for current season rows when the service batch is run
AND If player has switched Orgs, each Org gets it's own row for that year
AND "Days with Club" is the total # of days player spent with the club irrespective of whether he got service or not. If a player was traded, the "To" club gets service credit for that day
AND 'Days toward 172' is how many days with this club counted towards service upto a max of 172
AND Total Season service is the total # of service days this season irrespective of Org. Only the row for his most recent Org is populated.
AND Total MLS is his total current MLS for this current season. For rows with previous Orgs, populate with the MLS that the player left the Org with

title: As BOC, I want only certain users to have permission to manually adjust service
custom_steps:
**AC**
- Ability to adjust service is a special permission that is granted to only a certain set of BOC users. Any user without this permission does not see the pencil icons and ADD ROW button on this widget

title: A Club/BOC, I want to see Option and Outright info from ebis 1 in ebis 2
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as a club or BOC
custom_steps: WHEN user is viewing a player profile
custom_expected:
THEN Add the Transactions tab to the player profile according to the following wireframe: http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=transactions
AND the Outrights and Options collapsible sections (expanded by default) are presen t
AND Info from ebis 1 should be populated in the corresponding fields in ebis 2
AND Note that "Outright Days - Current Season" has been removed as a field
AND The Prior Outright field will show either "No"or the date of the prior outright if there was one.

title: As BOC, I want to see a day by day breakdown of player's Minor League service days
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the breakdown widget in the Service tab of an MN player's profile:
custom_expected:
THEN the user sees the following 4 columns. 
- MN Roster Status EOD
- Club EOD (minor league club at end of day if any)
- Mnr Service (LOP at which player got service credit)
- Mnr Day (ticks up with each day of Mnr service)


**Wireframe**
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=service

title: As BOC, I want to calculate a player's Minor League service days
custom_steps: WHEN user views a breakdown of an MN player's service
custom_expected:
THEN for each day of the season, including the first and last day, if the player had one of statuses listed below at any point during the day, he gets one day of MN service.

7DL - 7 Day DL
60D - 60 Day DL
ACT - Active


**Wireframe**
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=service

title: As BOC, I want to see a yearly summary of Minor Service on the player's profile from ebis 1
custom_preconds:
GIVEN logged in as BOC

**Wireframe**
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=service
custom_steps: WHEN user views the service tab of an MN player's profile
custom_expected:
THEN on the player profile service tab, add the Minor League Summary section as a collapsible section to the page. It should be expanded by default.
AND bring over all Minor lg Service history from ebis 1 and display in this section. 
AND the Contract Year column, Service Year column and Foreign Year column are OUT OF SCOPE for go-live. All other columns in the table should be populated with data from ebis 1
AND when player has played for multiple Orgs in the same year, each Org has it's own row for that year. 

**Wireframe**
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=service

title: As BOC, I want the Minor League Service to be given to player automatically every night
custom_steps: WHEN an MN player qualifies for service for the upcoming day based on his current minor league roster status
custom_expected: THEN tick up his MN service automatically after midnight
